DOC.brief_summary: Randomized, controlled trial evaluating the effect of an intraoperative infusion of intravenous ketamine and lidocaine on the quantity of opioid consumed postoperatively in cardiac surgery patients receiving a median sternotomy.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Lidocaine and Ketamine on Analgesia Post-Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 years of age or older coming for cardiac surgery, able to consent prior to surgery Minimally invasive cardiac surgery Preoperative opioid use Preoperative hepatic dysfunction
